serialize

private void serialize(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objectList,
                       java.lang.String objectNamePrefix,
                       java.lang.Class<DummyClass> objectClass,
                       java.lang.String outputFileName)
Parameters:
objectList - - Objects to be serialized to xml
objectNamePrefix - - Prefix for objects' xml tag e.g. "node"
objectClass - - Class of the objects
outputFileName - - File path for the output Note: XStream is picky about the objectNamePrefix, rather, try strings of this form: "string1" and not obj.toString() Note: Only 1 object type at a time, all object in 'objectList' must be of type 'objectClass'

deserialize

Deserializes an xml file and returns the objects in a list.

Parameters:
inputFileName -
Returns:
list of objects
